values.text: Your order has been placed and will be mailed to $email. Kindly pay the amount using $payment.
How would you like to make the payment? We accept COD, UPI and Card payment.
Nice to meet you, $name.  How may I help you today??
What would you like to buy?? We have groceries, fruits and Vegetables. You may place the order or have a look at the rate list.
